title: India In Very Good Position To Listen To Both Russia, Ukraine: German Envoy
content: German Ambassador Philipp Ackermann has noted that Germany has always said India is in a "very good position" to basically listen to both sides when it comes to the Russia-Ukraine conflict.
summary: German Ambassador Philipp Ackermann has noted that Germany has always said India is in a "very good position" to basically listen to both sides when it comes to the Russia-Ukraine conflict.

title: US Says Evidence Of N.Korea Troops In Russia
content: US Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin said Wednesday there is evidence North Korea has sent troops to Russia, but that the purpose of the deployment is still unknown.
summary: US Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin said Wednesday there is evidence North Korea has sent troops to Russia, but that the purpose of the deployment is still unknown.

title: Leonardo DiCaprio's Russian Lookalike Enlists In Army After Weight Gain
content: A Moscow-based actor known for resembling Leonardo DiCaprio has seen his career take a downturn, leading to significant weight gain.

title: PM's Modi Full Speech At 16th BRICS Summit In Russia
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi today strongly pitched for "single-minded" focus and "firm support" of all in combating terrorism, asserting that there is no place for "double standards" to deal with the challenge.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi today strongly pitched for "single-minded" focus and "firm support" of all in combating terrorism, asserting that there is no place for "double standards" to deal with the challenge.

title: Video: Passengers Take Control Of Bus After Driver Suffers Seizure In US
content: Two passengers on a Colorado Springs transit bus heroically intervened when the driver collapsed due to a medical emergency on October 14.

title: Microsoft Launches AI Agents That Send Emails, Take Action On Your Behalf
content: The next phase in AI revolution is building agents - tools that can complete established tasks without human intervention by combining reasoning powered by generative AI with existing databases and software.

title: "Peace On Border Should Be Priority," PM Modi Tells Xi Jinping In Russia
content: PM Modi and Xi Jinping met in Russia today for the first bilateral meeting since 2019. Ties between India and China had taken a severe hit since the military standoff in Ladakh as a result of Beijing's "unilateral" actions of violating the LAC.
summary: PM Modi and Xi Jinping met in Russia today for the first bilateral meeting since 2019. Ties between India and China had taken a severe hit since the military standoff in Ladakh as a result of Beijing's "unilateral" actions of violating the LAC.

title: Opinion: What Makes Trump What He Is
content: How does such a deceitful, narcissistic, and malicious man seek election to the most powerful office in the world for the third time as the head of a party once led by Abraham Lincoln?

title: German Police Raided Pizzeria For Serving Side Orders Of Cocaine
content: Authorities were alerted in March by food inspectors, and following months of surveillance, they arrested the pizzeria's manager at his home.
summary: Authorities were alerted in March by food inspectors, and following months of surveillance, they arrested the pizzeria's manager at his home.

title: Who Is Indian-Origin Pam Kaur, HSBC's 1st Female CFO In 160-Year History
content: HSBC Bank has named Indian-origin Pam Kaur as its new Chief Financial Officer (CFO), the first woman to hold this position in its 160-year history. She is replacing Georges Elhedery, who took over as CEO earlier this year.
summary: HSBC Bank has named Indian-origin Pam Kaur as its new Chief Financial Officer (CFO), the first woman to hold this position in its 160-year history. She is replacing Georges Elhedery, who took over as CEO earlier this year.

title: "We Support Dialogue And Diplomacy, Not War": PM Modi At BRICS Summit
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Wednesday said "India supports dialogue and diplomacy... and not war" as he spoke at a closed-door plenary session of the BRICS Summit in Russia.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Wednesday said "India supports dialogue and diplomacy... and not war" as he spoke at a closed-door plenary session of the BRICS Summit in Russia.

title: HSBC Names Indian-Origin Banker Pam Kaur As Its First Woman CFO
content: HSBC Holdings Plc, which was founded by a Scotsman more than 150-years ago, named Pam Kaur the first female chief financial officer in its history.
summary: HSBC Holdings Plc, which was founded by a Scotsman more than 150-years ago, named Pam Kaur the first female chief financial officer in its history.

title: "Impossible For...": WHO Says Gaza Polio Campaign Postponed Due To Violence
content: A polio vaccination campaign in north Gaza has been postponed due to Israeli bombardments, mass displacement and lack of access, the World Health Organization said.
summary: A polio vaccination campaign in north Gaza has been postponed due to Israeli bombardments, mass displacement and lack of access, the World Health Organization said.

title: US Elections: Kamala Harris Leans On Enthusiasm Of Black Voters
content: One recent New York Times/Siena poll that set off alarm bells said Harris has only 78 percent Black support, compared to approximately 90 percent for President Joe Biden when he defeated Trump four years ago.
summary: One recent New York Times/Siena poll that set off alarm bells said Harris has only 78 percent Black support, compared to approximately 90 percent for President Joe Biden when he defeated Trump four years ago.

title: Trudeau Aides Spoke To US Paper Before "Bishnoi Gang Links" Claim: Report
content: Senior aides of Canada Prime Minister Justin Trudeau, including his national security advisor Nathalie Drouin, shared confidential information about India - and claiming 'interference' in Ottawa's affairs - to a US paper, a Canadian publication said.

title: He Met With An Accident, Was Late For Work. Boss Said "Only Death Can..."

title: "Now Is The Time" To End Gaza War, Says US
content: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken said on Wednesday "now is the time" to end the conflict in Gaza, and urged Israel to avoid further escalation with Iran.
